name: MoeMoni Land
description:
This game tells the story of the creepy great demons from the "Night Parade of One Hundred Demons"... having a happy childhood?!
Hey there! Just how adorable can young monster forms be? In "Monster Tot Kindergarten," you can see the young forms of 21 well-known monsters like Tengu, Shuten Doji, Tamamo no Mae, and more. They possess incredible skills yet have their own unique quirks. You and your friends can play as these little monsters and put on a thrilling and fun social deduction drama.


"MoeMoni Land" is a social deduction game with a gameplay foundation based on deduction. It blends a Japanese-style world of monsters and folklore, creating a system with three camps: "students," "demons," and "neutrals." You can choose from 21 adorable little monster characters, each with 17 different talented professions, making the already suspenseful school more strategic. Play with 6-12 players online, complete mission goals with your friends from the same camp, and strive for victory together!

◆ 21 Super Popular Cute Monsters ◆

21 incredibly popular monster kids, transformed into adorable, chibi-style kindergarten children. Each little monster has unique skills with gorgeous interactive effects when using their abilities.

◆ Explore Diverse and Fun Missions ◆

Throughout the game, there are creative mini-games to discover, which can be triggered as little monster characters. These mini-games are full of creative fun and are incredibly engaging.

◆ Students or Demons - Three Major Camps ◆

Students, demons, and neutrals, three major camps with a gathering of experts! Will you be a righteous student, a sly little villain, or a mischievous prankster? It's your choice!

◆ Righteous or Sly - Various Professions ◆

With 17 different professions, initiate the most exciting deduction party. Win as you like, start a meeting with a single tap, and the rest depends on your fantastic acting skills!

◆ Text or Voice - Two-way Discussion ◆

The game supports both voice and text discussions, offering diverse social gameplay options. Overcome social anxiety in an instant!
